webwork-tex.statement:
What do the following equations represent in \(R^3\)? \leavevmode\\\relax Match the two sets of letters:
\par a. a vertical plane \leavevmode\\\relax b. a horizontal plane \leavevmode\\\relax c. a plane which is neither vertical nor horizontal \leavevmode\\\relax
\leavevmode\\\relax \mbox{\parbox[t]{3ex}{\hrulefill}} A. \(9x + 9y = 9\)
\leavevmode\\\relax \mbox{\parbox[t]{3ex}{\hrulefill}} B. \(x = -8\)
\leavevmode\\\relax \mbox{\parbox[t]{3ex}{\hrulefill}} C. \(y = -3\)
\leavevmode\\\relax \mbox{\parbox[t]{3ex}{\hrulefill}} D. \(z = 5\)
